resources.string: Forgot your phone or Running low on battery?\nDon't worry we have got you covered
GetMyCall allows you set call forwarding simply by sending a SMS with a password.
GetMyCall is an application which helps you to redirect or forward incoming calls on your Smartphone to another Smartphone with the help of a SMS
\t1.Take a Smartphone, you want to receive your calls on\n\t2.Send a SMS from it to your Smartphone\n\t3.Ta Da! You\'ll now start receiving your calls phone calls on this new device
Please set your primary sim as default sim for calling in settings. Unless default sim, Get My App May not work as expected!
To read the Sms, inorder to detect the trigger Sms
To call the USSD code, inorder to set call forwarding
GetMyCall is an application which helps you to redirect or forward incoming calls on your Smartphone to another Smartphone with the help of a SMS
\t1.Take a Smartphone, you want to receive your calls on
\t2.Send a SMS from it to your Smartphone
\t3.Ta Da! You\'ll now start receiving your calls phone calls on this new device
* Number is the mobile number to which the phone calls has to be diverted
Divert your calls with just an SMS
* Mobile number on which you would like to receive your calls
* Mobile number whose calls you want to divert by sending a message
